### General
::: {.panel-tabset .nav-pills}
#### Malaysian government sources

##### Public Sector Open Data: [www.data.gov.my](https://www.data.gov.my)
Data catalogue across multiple government agencies in machine-readable format, including accompanying dashboards. See also the [archived open data portal](http://archive.data.gov.my/), including datasets released by the [Penang State Government](https://archive.data.gov.my/data/ms_MY/dataset/?q=&organization=Kerajaan+Negeri+Pulau+Pinang&sort=title_string+asc)

##### Malaysia's national statistical agency, [Department of Statistics Malaysia](https://www.dosm.gov.my/) (DOSM)
- Most reports are now available on the main site in PDFs with accompanying Excel files. For other reports (especially older reports), refer to [eStatistik](https://newss.statistics.gov.my) (free sign-up). Scans of historical publications may be available at [StatsDigital](https://statsdigital.stats.gov.my/).
- [OpenDOSM](https://open.dosm.gov.my/) is a scoped version of data.gov.my hosting only DOSM data
- [MysIDC (to be discontinued in favour of OpenDOSM)](https://mysidc.statistics.gov.my/)

#### In-house data publications 

##### Penang Economic and Development Report

Biennial socioeconomic review produced by Penang Institute, commissioned by the Penang Economic Planning Unit. 

- [2019/2020](https://penanginstitute.org/publications/books-and-reports/penang-economic-and-development-report-2019-2020/)
- [2017/2018](https://penanginstitute.org/wp-content/uploads/jml/files/PEDR-2017-2018/PEDR_2017-2018_1-160.pdf)
- [2015/2016](https://penanginstitute.org/wp-content/uploads/2020/02/PEDR_2015-2016.pdf)

##### Penang in Numbers

Compilation of socioeconomic data including demography, agriculture, tourism, social work, infrastructure, etc.

- [2017-2018](https://penanginstitute.org/wp-content/uploads/2020/02/eBook_Penang-In-Numbers-2017-2018.pdf)
- [2016-2017](https://penanginstitute.org/wp-content/uploads/2020/02/Buku-Data-Penang-2016-2017.pdf)
- [2014-2015](https://penanginstitute.org/wp-content/uploads/jml/files/Penang-in-Numbers-2014-2015.pdf)
- [2013](https://penanginstitute.org/wp-content/uploads/jml/files/PgInNumbers_2013.pdf)

##### Quarterly Penang Statistics
Discontinued. View [archives](quarterly_penang_statistics.html).
